welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castelletto sopra Ticino, a charming city known for its breathtaking views and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a range of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Lugano Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for VIP travelers, with personalized services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
